title: Calvin and Hobbes 3: In the Shadow of the Night
description: The third volume in a series of comic cartoons starring the Calvin and Hobbes pair.Calvin, cheeky, hyperactive and mischievous, and Hobbes, his cuddly toy tiger who, as far as Calvin is concerned is very much alive and kicking, are two of the most loveable and hilarious characters to grace the comic strip in years.Sit back and enjoy . . .
author: Bill Watterson
